duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist drivers and other employees in the collection of solid waste materials from residential areas.
Load solid waste into the waste collection vehicle and sort recyclables if applicable.
Assist in the safe operation of the vehicle by directing the driver and operating equipment on the truck.
Ensure compliance with safety regulations and perform safety and equipment checks.
Maintain route quality standards and wear required personal protective equipment at all times.
Assist in cleaning the vehicle, sorting materials, and attending safety meetings.
Perform other duties as required by management.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) desired, but not required
